Meeting to Remember President Kim Il Sung Held in Russia
articles.content:
Russian Foreign Minister Arrives 
    Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of Russia, arrived here today to visit the DPRK at the invitation of Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK.
 He and his party were met at the airport by Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, Andrei Gennadievich Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy here.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian Foreign Minister 
   Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today met and had a friendly conversation with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
 Present there were the Russian foreign minister's party and Andrei Gennadievich Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy here.
 Also present were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.content:
2005-2006 Plan of Exchange between For. Ministries of DPPK and Russia 
    Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A 2005-2006 plan of exchange between the foreign ministries of the DPRK and the Russian Federation was signed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on July 4.
 Present at the signing ceremony on the DPRK side were Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned and on the opposite side were Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, his party, Russian Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Andrei Gennadievich Karlov and staff members of his embassy here.    
 The plan was inked by Paek Nam Sun and Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov.

Governor of Russian Maritime Territory Donates Fund to Constr. of Church in DPRK
    Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Sergey Mikhailovich Darikin, governor of the Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation, sent an aid fund to the
construction site of the Jongbaek Church.
 The fund was conveyed to an official concerned Friday by the Russian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK.
